Clip.Title: JEFFERSON'S SECRET BIBLE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Experts at Smithsonian Institution's National Museum of American History are trying 200 years later, to preserve Jefferson's secret bible, a book he constructed by cutting apart the New Testament to tell a chronological story of Jesus's life, parables, and moral instruction, removing all mention of miracles and the resurrection.

Clip.Title: SHACKLETON'S FROZEN HELL
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In 1914, the world's first trans-Antarctic expedition came to a cold stop. Trapped in ice just 60 miles from their destination, explorer Ernest Shackleton and his crew found themselves in a dire situation that would play out as a two-year battle against starvation, sub-zero conditions, and the threat of being swallowed by the unforgiving Southern Ocean.

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: The Flame and Cross: The South Caucasus
Clip.EpisodeSummary: 25 years after first filming the route, the original film crew returns to the region for a modern look.

Clip.Title: JEFFERSON'S SECRET BIBLE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Experts at Smithsonian Institution's National Museum of American History are trying 200 years later, to preserve Jefferson's secret bible, a book he constructed by cutting apart the New Testament to tell a chronological story of Jesus's life, parables, and moral instruction, removing all mention of miracles and the resurrection.

Clip.Title: SHACKLETON'S FROZEN HELL
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In 1914, the world's first trans-Antarctic expedition came to a cold stop. Trapped in ice just 60 miles from their destination, explorer Ernest Shackleton and his crew found themselves in a dire situation that would play out as a two-year battle against starvation, sub-zero conditions, and the threat of being swallowed by the unforgiving Southern Ocean.

Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey over New Brunswick's Bay of Fundy coastline explores geological wonders, the loyalist city of Saint John and international borders beyond and one of the world's most famous waterways.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Technology is advancing at a geometric rate. Find out how far we have come and how far our minds are going to innovate.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Her husband lies wounded, unable to walk, so Laura Secord sets out on a long journey to warn the British of a possible American attack.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Water in the World's 8th Largest Economy
Clip.EpisodeSummary: As world population increases, the struggle over one of the earth's most valuable resources continues to intensify. Take a look at water in California, the world's 8th largest economy. Is the world in danger of running out of water?

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Journey into the Ice Age and Solar Eclipse Chasers
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey back into the days of the Ice Age and see what life was like. And, meet eclipse chasers - adventurers who travel the world to witness and document solar eclipses.

Clip.Title: BETWEEN EARTH AND SKY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Sebastien Lafont, a young balloonist explorer, travels around the world to meet traditional communities who live in remote parts.

Clip.Title: BETWEEN EARTH AND SKY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Sebastien Lafont, a young balloonist explorer, travels around the world to meet traditional communities who live in remote parts.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: ARABIA UNCOVERED
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover Saudi Arabia's fascinating past, captured in over 200 artifacts. Each item reveals stories of the migrants, traders, and pilgrims who have been drawn to this land for centuries.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Trek across the vast plains of China on the cramped but culturally diverse train line.

Clip.Title: RIVERS OF THE WORLD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Learn why the ancestral river of the Incas is so essential to the survival of the nearby villages. And why they are all in danger.
